import React from'react';import{Row,Col}from'react-bootstrap';import{Card}from'react-bootstrap';import{useData}from'../contexts/DataContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const KPIs=()=>{const{kpis,loading}=useData();// Default values when loading
const kpiData=loading?[{title:"% de Env√≠os en SLA",value:"Cargando...",description:"Env√≠os que llegaron sin incidentes",icon:"üì¶",color:"secondary"},{title:"Tiempo Medio de Detecci√≥n",value:"Cargando...",description:"Tiempo promedio para detectar incidentes",icon:"‚è±Ô∏è",color:"secondary"},{title:"% de Falsos Positivos",value:"Cargando...",description:"Alertas que no correspondieron a incidentes reales",icon:"‚ö†Ô∏è",color:"secondary"}]:[{title:"% de Env√≠os en SLA",value:"".concat(kpis.slaPercentage,"%"),description:"Env√≠os que llegaron sin incidentes",icon:"üì¶",color:"success"},{title:"Tiempo Medio de Detecci√≥n",value:"".concat(kpis.mttDetection," seg"),description:"Tiempo promedio para detectar incidentes",icon:"‚è±Ô∏è",color:"info"},{title:"% de Falsos Positivos",value:"".concat(kpis.falsePositiveRate,"%"),description:"Alertas que no correspondieron a incidentes reales",icon:"‚ö†Ô∏è",color:"warning"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"kpis-container mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"mb-4",children:"Indicadores Clave de Rendimiento"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:kpiData.map((kpi,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:4,className:"mb-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{className:"kpi-card border-".concat(kpi.color),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Body,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{className:"text-muted small",children:kpi.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{className:"display-4 fw-bold mb-0 ".concat(loading?'text-muted':''),children:kpi.value}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("small",{className:"text-muted",children:kpi.description})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"kpi-icon display-4",children:kpi.icon})]})})})},index))})]});};export default KPIs;
